A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I joined just to be able to get this off my chest.

What are the critics thinking?

****Spoilers****



This movie went wrong in so many ways. It's like they decided to ignore all of the questions set up in TFA. And then\, they decided to add insult to injury and make the movie like a Robot Chicken Episode.

Is this Robot Chicken Judo? Like\, make fun of it first and steal their energy kind of thing?

Finn and New girls's Plot was pointless. Poe Dameron's Mutiny was pointless. Luke's chucking the lightsaber away was dumb and insulting.


Princess Leia's floating\, force space Jesus moment was pointless and needlessly insulting (and looked beyond cheesy!!!).

And then there are the missed opportunities. The critics talk about Rian Johnson taking risks. Uh\, no. He had a chance to but chickened our. A Rey/Ren teamup? That would have been interesting and original. And daring. 

But sorry no: Fooled You (said like Dark Helmet). They just jerked you around and then went back to business as normal.

Another lost opportunity: Billy Dee Williams. What is the mother effing point of Benicio Del Toro's lame\, pointless character? Imagine if the man they had been sent to look for was Lando Calrissian? 
They would have been cheering in the aisles.

Terrible\, terrible movie.
